channel.title: [Hyperion - PJA]Adding new models
channel.description:
Posted again since this was completely ignored...
Hello, I am interested in adding new models to the Annihilation source (Based on Hyperion) and have run into trouble.
I have NO idea how to get this even started. I looked at a few guides on the models page, but Hyperion doesnt seem to be in any of them. Do I need to create a new Model Handler class or something, that loads all these .dats? I am open to any suggestions, please let me know.
Thank you, -Luke

item.title: [Hyperion - PJA]Adding new models
item.dc:creator: @xluke xluke
item.description:
@xluke wrote:

Lmao, I just realized that after posting this. It was a tiny matter of creating a method that pulls them.

Im retarded, Im going to go beat my head against a wall. Thank you sir.

Read full topic
